chunk:
ZENMED Essential Makeup Wipes

Brand: ZENMED

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Purified Water, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aloe Vera Juice, Extracts of Cucumber, Green Tea and Sea Algae, Sodium chloride, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Cetrimonium Chloride, Rose Flower Extract.

Directions: Gently press and wipe away makeup from eyes, lips and face. Wash face with normal ZENMED facial cleanser

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
